DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine wether dynamic humeral center effective patient impingement syndrome shoulder
DOC.criteria: age > 30 year pain duration > 1 month presence least 2 positive impingement test result Neer , Yocum Hawkins test total Constant score < 80. concern shoulder stiffness anteroposterior instability tendinous calcification corticosteroid injection within previous 30 day previous surgery humeral fracture inflammatory joint disease neoplastic disorder
